Combine melted butter, brown sugar, corn syrup, eggs, salt, vanilla, and chopped pecans in a large bowl; mix well. Pour the mixture into the pie shell.

Place the pie in the oven and bake for 10 minutes. Then reduce the temperature to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C) and continue baking for an additional 30 to 40 minutes, or until the pie is golden brown.
